column.name: SBWJZSFCZWPLSJ
column.describe: 申报文件中是否存在未披露数据

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: LXSHYJ_FXXM
column.describe: 立项审核意见(风险项目)

column.name: LXZKBSHY
column.describe: 立项质控部审核员(主审)

column.name: LXZKBSHY_FS
column.describe: 立项质控部审核员(副审)

column.name: NHZKBSHY_ZS
column.describe: 内核质控部审核员(主审)

column.name: NHZKBSHY_FS
column.describe: 内核质控部审核员(副审)

column.name: ZKBGZDGSHYJ
column.describe: 质控部工作底稿审核意见

column.name: XDHSBWJJCYSM
column.describe: 修订后申报文件及差异说明
column.comment: 上报内核申请文件与提交内核会议申请文件差异说明及补充工作底稿目录

column.name: ZKBECSHYJHF
column.describe: 项目组回复二次审核意见

column.name: SCNHHYYJHZ
column.describe: 上传内核会议意见汇总

column.name: NHHYSHYJHFWD
column.describe: 项目组回复内核意见汇总

column.name: SBWJXDSMJBCGZDGML
column.describe: 申报修订说明及补充工作底稿
column.comment: 拟申报文件修订说明及补充工作底稿目录

column.name: BJZYSXJZDCWHB
column.describe: 上传问核会议决议(如有)

column.name: WYZZTPJGHZ
column.describe: 委员最终投票结果汇总(含外委)

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: NHBTJXMZHFBS
column.describe: 内核办提交项目组回复标识

column.name: XMZHFNHBYJ
column.describe: 项目组回复内核办意见

column.name: LXFS
column.option: 1|线上内核表决;2|线下内核表决

column.name: XMZFKNHBBS
column.describe: 项目组反馈内核办标识

column.name: TX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“尽职调查阶段”底稿上传工作，并在本系统中完成立项审批流程后，才能发起内核流程<font>'

column.name: DGXTJZDCJDSCBL
column.describe: 底稿系统尽职调查阶段上传比例
column.comment: 底稿系统项目承揽及立项阶段上传比例

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'

restrictions.condition:
{"statement":"({0} IS NULL 
OR ({0} = 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHSP_NHCL WHERE lcIB_NHSP_ID = lcIB_NHSP.ID))
OR ({0} = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHSP_NHCL WHERE lcIB_NHSP_ID = lcIB_NHSP.ID)))
AND ((SELECT XMLX FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX WHERE ID = lcIB_NHSP.XMMC) = {1} OR {1} IS NULL)
AND ((SELECT SSBM FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX WHERE ID = lcIB_NHSP.XMMC) = {2} OR {2} IS NULL)
AND (DECODE(lcIB_NHSP.LXFS,1,lcIB_NHSP.BJJZRQ,2,lcIB_NHSP.HYSJ) >= {3} OR {3} IS NULL)
AND (DECODE(lcIB_NHSP.LXFS,1,lcIB_NHSP.BJJZRQ,2,lcIB_NHSP.HYSJ) <= {4} OR {4} IS NULL)
AND (INSTR((SELECT XMMC FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX WHERE ID = lcIB_NHSP.XMMC),{5})>0 OR {5} IS NULL)
AND ((SELECT SSHY FROM ECIF.TIB_KHXX WHERE ID = (SELECT SSKH FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX WHERE ID = lcIB_NHSP.XMMC)) = {6} OR {6} IS NULL)
AND (lcIB_NHSP.HYJG = {7} OR {7} IS NULL)
AND ((SELECT STATE FROM JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WHERE ID = lcIB_NHSP.InstID) = {8} OR {8} IS NULL)","args":[{"expression":"parameter.DGYJ","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.XMLX","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.SSBM","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.RQQJ","scale":0,"length":0,"type":13},{"expression":"parameter.RQQJ_JS","scale":0,"length":0,"type":13},{"expression":"parameter.XMMC","scale":0,"length":0,"type":0},{"expression":"parameter.SSHY.ID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.HYJG","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.LCZT","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}],"type":0}

command.describe: 上传全套内核材料扫描版
